changeSet.author: mdunaev
changeSet.sql: create table if not exists persons ( id bigint primary key unique, full_name varchar(200) not null, birthdate date not null, gender varchar(10), crush varchar(10), description varchar not null, created_at timestamp default now(), updated_at timestamp default now() ); create table if not exists persons_to_persons ( id serial primary key unique, user_id bigint not null, crush_id bigint not null, created_at timestamp default now(), updated_at timestamp default now(), UNIQUE (user_id, crush_id) );
